name: The Hearts I
effect: Gain an extra half heart.

name: The Hearts II
effect: Gain an extra heart.

name: The Hearts III
effect: Gain an extra 2 hearts.

name: Weeping Moon
effect: 30% more damage during the night.

name: Nature's Boon
effect: Harvest bonus resources.

name: The Lovers I
effect: Blue Heart +1.

name: The Lovers II
effect: Blue Heart +2.

name: All Seeing Sun
effect: Do 20% more damage during the day.

name: True Sight
effect: The Lamb has a 10% chance of a crit when dealing damage.
effect_1: The Lamb has a 20% chance of a crit when dealing damage.

name: Telescope
effect: Reveals the map.

name: Hands of Rage
effect: Fire a projectile when you swing your weapon. 10s cooldown.
effect_1: Fire a projectile when you swing your weapon. 5s cooldown.

name: The Burning Dead
effect: Dead enemy bodies explode, damaging other enemies.

name: Diseased Heart
effect: Allows the Lamb to deal damage to everything on screen they are hit.

name: The Arachnid
effect: Allows the Lamb to deal poison damage to enemies when attacking.

name: Divine Strength
effect: Attack rate increased by 1.25x.

name: Master of the Art
effect: The Lamb's overall weapon damage increases by 1.2x.
effect_1: The Lamb's overall weapon damage increases by 1.5x.
effect_2: The Lamb's overall weapon damage increases by 1.75x.

name: The Path
effect: Increase movement speed by 1.25x.

name: Fervour's Harvest
effect: Enemies drop 2x more Fervor.

name: Soul Snatcher
effect: When killing an enemy 10% chance of healing.
effect_1: When killing an enemy 20% chance of healing.

name: Shield of Faith
effect: When attacked 10% chance of negating damage.
effect_1: When attacked 20% chance of negating damage.

name: The Bomb
effect: Drop an explosive when you roll 10s cooldown.
effect_1: Drop an explosive when you roll 5s cooldown.

name: Ichor Earned
effect: Drop black Ichor on hit.

name: Ichor Lingered
effect: Drop black Ichor when you roll 10s cooldown.
effect_1: Drop black Ichor when you roll 5s cooldown.

name: Mithridatism
effect: Immune to poison from enemies.

name: Blazing Trial
effect: Rolling into an enemy will damage them.

name: Divine Curse
effect: Allows curses to consume 25% less Fervor.
effect_1: Allows curses to consume 50% less Fervor.
effect_2: Allows curses to consume 75% less Fervor.

name: Strength from Within
effect: Fervour will slowly replenish over time 2.5s cooldown.
effect_1: Fervour will slowly replenish over time 1.5s cooldown.

name: Strength from Without
effect: Receive 5 fervour when hit.

name: Neptune's Curse
effect: Enemies have a chance of dropping a fish upon death.

name: Fortune's Blessing
effect: The Lambs gains double health when healing.

name: Death's Door
effect: When hit down to half a heart, all enemies will be dealt 2 damage.
effect_1: When hit down to half a heart, all enemies will be dealt 3 damage.
effect_2: When hit down to half a heart, all enemies will be dealt 10 damage.

name: The Deal
effect: When killed, resurrect with 1 heart

name: Rabbit's Foot
effect: Increases the chance to spawn better chests.

name: Ambrosia
effect: Increase curse damage by 1.25x.

name: Gift From Below
effect: The Lamb has a 10% chance of receiving a blue heart upon killing an enemy.
effect_1: The Lamb has a 20% chance of receiving a blue heart upon killing an enemy.

name: Fervour's Host
effect: Fervour replenishes fully when entering a new combat room.
